amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds in H.R. 1 to provide payments (or to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel to provide payments) to the Brazil Cotton Institute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 89 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in H.R. 1 to provide payments (or to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel to provide payments) to the Brazil Cotton Institute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kind amendment (A098) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 246 (Roll no. 101).
